"Eric " wrote:

> Hi everybody. I'm a history & anthroplogy student doing a project on
> how the peace of the tokugawa era affected what could be
> called "samurai culture". If anyone could provide me with any
> links , web addressess, info, insights, etc, please email me at
> erikb_02809@.... I've got a martial arts background and am
> familiar with basic samurai terminolgy, so I don't need any help
> explaining to me the difference between a wakizashi and a katana, I
> need help finding info on advanced stuff like japanese culture
> during the tokugawa era, etc. thanks _ Eric

You need to get and read "Taming the Samurai" by Ikegami. The entire subject
of her book is just that very topic.


Tony
